thread.title: South Korean Investors Pile Into U.S. Commercial Property Debt

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: South Korean Investors Pile Into U.S. Commercial Property Debt
text:
COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE South Korean Investors Pile Into U.S. Commercial Property Debt U.S. commercial real-estate owners are raking in debt capital from South Korean investors hunting for higher returns and better asset diversification.
Cedar Realty Trust Chief Faces Sexual-Harassment Allegations A Brooklyn judge will decide whether to allow a sexual-harassment and pay-discrimination lawsuit filed by former Cedar Realty Trust Inc. Chief Operating Officer Nancy Mozzachio against CEO Bruce Schanzer to proceed.
